name: Dog Rescue: Python Text RPG
description:
In this game, decide whether you want to rescue a dog you find on the side of the road. If you choose to, you'll get to make many more choices about the dog's care, socialization, and training. You'll also receive a randomized breed and gender, and you'll be able to name your dog. 

This game was coded using Python 3. This is my very first attempt at creating a game through coding. Any tips or suggestions are welcome, but please be kind. 

This game is currently only downloadable on Windows and Linux, but we will hopefully be adding a Mac download soon. 

If you'd like to read my blog-post about the creation game, see this link: 

https://madisonwhite223.wixsite.com/madisonwhitewrites/blog/i-coded-a-video-game

Thanks for playing and enjoy!
